about_the_game:
Welcome to Swing Into Zero-G, space racers! An adrenaline-pumping multiplayer racing adventure game set in the endless expanse of space. In this game, you’ll experience the excitement of defying gravity and soaring through cosmic environments, where skill, strategy, and quick reflexes reign supreme.

The Thrill of Space Racing:

Embark on a high-speed journey through a series of space-themed racetracks. Each track is filled with unique obstacles and challenges that require mastery of the swing and gravity mechanics. Whether you're dodging asteroids or navigating through intricate space stations, every race is an exhilarating new experience.

Swing Mechanics and Gravity Manipulation:

At the heart of "Swing Into Zero-G" is its innovative swinging mechanic. Players must use their grappling hook-like tool to swing from point to point, creating a thrilling and fluid racing experience. Combine this with the ability to manipulate gravity, and you have a race that's not just about speed, but about clever movement and strategy.

Competitive Multiplayer:

Racing is more fun with friends, and Swing Into Zero-G delivers an intense multiplayer experience. Compete in casual races with friends, or dive into solo matches for a more competitive thrill. With support for up to four players, every race is a chaotic and fun-filled battle for first place.

Diverse Skills and Abilities:

To give you an edge in races, Swing Into Zero-G features a variety of skills and abilities. From firing homing missiles to laying traps, freezing opponents, or blinding them temporarily. Use these skills wisely to disrupt your competitors and secure your victory.

Customizable Controls:

The game offers a variety of control schemes to suit your playstyle. Whether you prefer a keyboard and mouse setup or a controller, you can customize your controls for optimal comfort and performance.

Vibrant Visuals and Immersive Environments:

Each race takes place against the backdrop of stunningly rendered cosmic landscapes. From the vibrant colors of alien flora to the metallic sheen of space stations, the visuals in Swing Into Zero-G are a feast for the eyes.

Key Features:


  • Fast-paced multiplayer races set in space
  • Unique swinging and gravity mechanics
  • Competitive & casual multiplayer modes
  • A variety of skills and abilities to master
  • Customizable controls for keyboard and mouse or controller
  • Stunning space-themed environments and racetracks



Swing Into Zero-G is more than just a race; it's an unforgettable adventure across the stars. Are you ready to swing into action?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: Swing Into Zero-G

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo E6600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-7100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Fast-paced multiplayer racing game set in the vastness of space. Compete against friends or online rivals in intense races, where quick reflexes and strategic use of diverse skills determine the victor. Embrace the challenge of swinging your way to victory in this exhilarating space-themed race!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
